title: Google\Cloud\Dataproc\V1\HadoopJob
name: HadoopJob
description:
A Dataproc job for running Apache Hadoop MapReduce jobs on Apache Hadoop YARN.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.dataproc.v1.HadoopJob

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.main_jar_file_uri
params.description: The HCFS URI of the jar file containing the main class. Examples: 'gs://foo-bucket/analytics-binaries/extract-useful-metrics-mr.jar' 'hdfs:/tmp/test-samples/custom-wordcount.jar' 'file:///home/usr/lib/hadoop-mapreduce/hadoop-mapreduce-examples.jar'

params.name: data.main_class
params.description: The name of the driver's main class. The jar file containing the class must be in the default CLASSPATH or specified in jar_file_uris.

params.name: data.args
params.description: Optional. The arguments to pass to the driver. Do not include arguments, such as -libjars or -Dfoo=bar, that can be set as job properties, since a collision may occur that causes an incorrect job submission.

params.name: data.jar_file_uris
params.description: Optional. Jar file URIs to add to the CLASSPATHs of the Hadoop driver and tasks.

params.name: data.file_uris
params.description: Optional. HCFS (Hadoop Compatible Filesystem) URIs of files to be copied to the working directory of Hadoop drivers and distributed tasks. Useful for naively parallel tasks.

params.name: data.archive_uris
params.description: Optional. HCFS URIs of archives to be extracted in the working directory of Hadoop drivers and tasks. Supported file types: .jar, .tar, .tar.gz, .tgz, or .zip.

params.name: data.properties
params.description: Optional. A mapping of property names to values, used to configure Hadoop. Properties that conflict with values set by the Dataproc API may be overwritten. Can include properties set in /etc/hadoop/conf/*-site and classes in user code.

params.name: data.logging_config
params.description: Optional. The runtime log config for job execution.
